input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly
sentences: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you'll be able to find the perfect tutor for your needs.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all around the world, you can learn any language you want, at your own pace.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you can learn any language you want!

input:
Write an ad for the following product

App: LangLang is an app that (1) allows you to track your language development, and (2) finds teachers that match what you need to improve on.

Tone: comical, informative
sentences:
Hey monolinguals and polyglots!

Looking to take your language skills to the next level? LangLang is the perfect app for you!

Learn a new language the fun way with LangLang! This app makes it easy to track your progress and find teachers that can help you improve in the areas you need help most. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, LangLang can help you learn faster and have more fun while doing it.
Are you learning a new language and feeling a little lost? LangLang can help! With our app, you can track your language development and find teachers that match what you need to improve on.
